item.title: Musk Suggests Tesla Shareholders Will Vote on xAI Investment
item.description: Tesla Inc. plans to poll shareholders on whether to invest in xAI, Elon Musk said after the Wall Street Journal reported SpaceX was prepared to funnel $2 billion into the Grok chatbot developer.
